long_description: Planning to hike around town to see the sites and explore a few cafes? The REI Rimrock sweater gives you the perfect blend of all-day comfort and town-friendly looks. Attractive cotton/nylon/wool exterior keeps you looking nice on casual outings. The REI Rimrock sweater has a relaxed fit.
short_description: Planning to hike around town to see the sites and explore a few cafes? The REI Rimrock sweater gives you the perfect blend of all-day comfort and town-friendly looks.
